meaningMnemonic: A <radical>greenhouse</radical> is the newest <radical>power</radical> of the city you decided to <kanji>recruit</kanji>. You’re trying to recruit all the buildings in town and the greenhouse was the next on your list. It adds just a little bit of power to the town, but it's important nonetheless.
readingMnemonic: After you <kanji>recruit</kanji> the greenhouse, you recruit <reading>Bo</reading>bo (ぼ) the clown to guard it for you. Bobo the clown has a terrifying amount of power so he’ll make an excellent guard for the greenhouse.
